GameEventAction.Description:
Our newly formed Republic will stand the test of time having recently completed:
[ULI][RESEARCH]Planetary Administration[/RESEARCH][/ULI]
We have also made great strides towards:
[ULI][RESEARCH]Diplomatic Focus[/RESEARCH][/ULI]
Our homeworld will become a beacon for peace and prosperity with our newly finished Planetary Administration Center, where we shall hold our grand assemblies, work out our differences, and forge a lasting peace.

Our thriving democracy stands on the precipice of a new eara of space exploration and tourism, with:
[ULI][RESEARCH]Starship Recreation Systems[/RESEARCH][/ULI] [ULI][RESEARCH]Interstellar Commerce[/RESEARCH][/ULI] [ULI][RESEARCH]Stellar Transport Systems[/RESEARCH][/ULI] [ULI][RESEARCH]Civilian Transports[/RESEARCH][/ULI]
It is time for our people to unite and reach for the stars!

Your vassals stand ready to serve your glorious reign, having recently completed:
[ULI][RESEARCH]Starfighter Hangar Bays[/RESEARCH][/ULI] [ULI][RESEARCH]Zero-G Combat[/RESEARCH][/ULI] [ULI][RESEARCH]Assault Pods[/RESEARCH][/ULI] [ULI][RESEARCH]Improved Crew Systems[/RESEARCH][/ULI] [ULI][RESEARCH]Royal Palace[/RESEARCH][/ULI]
Your elite troops stand at sharp attention along the halls of your newly completed Royal Palace, on this most auspicious day, the day of your military victory over competing houses for to unite this empire.
In addition, the first army awaits your command on the homeworld.

Our Captains of Industry await your order to open a new era of prosperty and wealth, having recently compelted:
[ULI][RESEARCH]Interstellar Commerce[/RESEARCH][/ULI] [ULI][RESEARCH]Enhanced Commerce Center[/RESEARCH][/ULI]
Our homeworld thrums with the sound of commerce, awaiting your bold expansion plans.

My Liege, we have recently completed:
[ULI][RESEARCH]Stellar Frigates[/RESEARCH][/ULI] [ULI][RESEARCH]Improved Crew Systems[/RESEARCH][/ULI] [ULI][RESEARCH]Mechs[/RESEARCH][/ULI] [ULI][RESEARCH]Royal Palace[/RESEARCH][/ULI]
Your top generals stand at sharp attention along the halls of your newly completed Royal Palace, on this most auspicious day, the day of your coup and rise to dominance over your people. No longer does another hold a real threat to your claim on sole dictatorship.
Additionally, two units of state of teh art mechs have just been commissioned and are ready to begin your conquest of the stars!

Sire, I am proud to announce the recent completion of:
[ULI][RESEARCH]Improved Command[/RESEARCH][/ULI] [ULI][RESEARCH]Improved Crew Systems[/RESEARCH][/ULI] [ULI][RESEARCH]Royal Palace[/RESEARCH][/ULI]
Your elite royal guard stands at sharp attention along the halls of your newly completed Royal Palace, on this most auspicious day, the day of your coronation.
Millions of your subjects look on from the courtyard below, and billions more are tuned in to state media in every corner of your empire to get a glimpse of their new sovereign, and wonder, what comes next?

Your initial directive as head researcher and first amongst equals has paid off with the completion of:
[ULI][RESEARCH]Exploration Scanners[/RESEARCH][/ULI] [ULI][RESEARCH]Planetary Exploration[/RESEARCH][/ULI] [ULI][RESEARCH]Long Range Sensors[/RESEARCH][/ULI]
Another [CHARACTER]scientist[/CHARACTER] nearly your equal has emerged to head up our day to day operations now that you have accepted your appointment as head of the government. Worry not that we will execute your directions with all professional alacrity as befits your example and legacy as chief scientist of this illustrious instituion. I eagerly await your further instructions to unlock the secrets of the stars to spread our kind over the whole of the cosmos!

The hive is ready to serve! We have completed some important breakthroughs in:
[ULI][RESEARCH]Improved Logistics[/RESEARCH][/ULI] [ULI][RESEARCH]Assault Pods[/RESEARCH][/ULI] [ULI][RESEARCH]Stellar Transport Systems[/RESEARCH][/ULI] [ULI][RESEARCH]Military Transports[/RESEARCH][/ULI] [ULI][RESEARCH]Stellar Frigates[/RESEARCH][/ULI]
Our first army awaits your command at our homeworld...

Librarian, we have just completed our initial research efforts to kickstart our efforts:
[ULI][RESEARCH]Standard Sensors[/RESEARCH][/ULI] [ULI][RESEARCH]Long Range Sensors[/RESEARCH][/ULI] [ULI][RESEARCH]Exploration Scanners[/RESEARCH][/ULI] [ULI][RESEARCH]Planetary Exploration[/RESEARCH][/ULI]
Knowledge is Power. Long have our lore masters gathered and hoarded the information of our world and its people. A whole galaxy awaits us to be meticulously analyzed, cataloged, and archived for the eons!
